decoder.name: arbor-fields
decoder.regex: Blocked Host: Blocked host (\S+) at (\S+) by (\.+) using (\.*)/(\S*) \((\S*)\) destination (\S*),URL: (\S*)
decoder.order: srcip, arbor_time, category, proto, dstport, service, dstip, url

decoder.name: arbor-fields
decoder.regex: Blocked host (\S*) at (\S*) by (\.*) using (\.*)/(\S*) \((\S*)\) destination (\S*) source port (\.*),URL: (\S*)
decoder.order: srcip, arbor_time, category, proto, dstport, service, dstip, srcport, url

decoder.name: arbor-fields
decoder.regex: Blocked host (\S*) at (\S*) by (\.*) using (\.*) destination (\S*) source port (\.*),URL: (\S*)
decoder.order: srcip, arbor_time, category, dstport, dstip, srcport, url

decoder.name: arbor-fields
decoder.regex: Blocked host (\S+) at (\S+) by (\.+) using (\S+) destination (\S+),URL: (\S+)
decoder.order: srcip, arbor_time, category, proto, dstip, url
